bibl.title: Newer Light on the Kingdom of Dotawo.
bibl.note: Argues that Dotawo and Dongola were in the 13th-14th centuries one and the same kingdom.

bibl.title: Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009)

bibl.seg: Giovanni R. Ruffini, Newer Light on the Kingdom of Dotawo.

J. van der Vliet & J.L. Hagen (edd.), with the assistance of C.H. van Zoest & L.E. van de Peut, Qasr Ibrim, Between Egypt and Africa. Studies in Cultural Exchange (NINO Symposium, Leiden, 11-12 December 2009) = Egyptologische Uitgave. 26 (Leuven, 2013) pp. 179-191, 5 tabl.
Argues that Dotawo and Dongola were in the 13th-14th centuries one and the same kingdom.
